cast.name: 默特·阿里·答以 Mert Ali Dayi

writer.name: 德尼兹汗·阿克巴巴 Denizhan Akbaba

this_title: James Potter and the Heir of the Sword
trans_title: 詹姆·波特与剑的继承人
introduction: StorylineOur story opens 19 years later with Albus Severus Potter going to Hogwarts. Scorpius Malfoy, who like Albus is in the Slytherin section, is the same age as James Sirius in this adaptation. Jealous of the relationship between Scorpius and Albus, James is in a kind of conflict with Malfoy to be the best brother. In this case, the prophecy of King Arthur's Monster, which occurs every 100 years, hits Hogwarts. A great adventure awaits our Potters and their friends who can't get out of trouble.
chinese_title: 詹姆·波特与剑的继承人
foreign_title: James Potter and the Heir of the Sword
